title: I Pick Up
subtle: Personal Recount (fiction), 42 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: In I Pick Up, a boy practices the important life skill of organization. Sentence patterns and supportive illustrations guide students as they read.
reviewWords: blanket, book, pick, room, shoes, teddy bear
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify problem and solution
awareness: Blend Onset and Rime                : Blend onset and rime
grammar: Periods                : Recognize and understand the use of periods
